Podcast #2 - The Power of Small Changes

Choosing to improve an habit doing a big change vs starting with a small change.

Why changes of 180º tend to usually don’t work so well?

A podcast recorded with the fierce noise  in background of the works in my neighbor’s  apartment.

Enjoy your practice.
